id: Ultimate Notion Template for GTD + Second Brain
name: Ultimate Notion Template for GTD + Second Brain
description: Ever felt like you consume a lot of content and data but aren't able to remember and put insights into action? That's exactly how I felt for the past decade, and have now solved that issue through my own second brain in Notion. I also use this for organizing my tasks through GTD.Here's the Notion template that I built.
